AccorHotels India hosts ‘One Accor One Sales Meet’ 2015 Published on : Tuesday, October 13, 2015
AccorHotels India recently concluded its third ‘One Accor One Sales Meet’, the annual sales and marketing brand summit at Novotel Vishakhapatnam Varun Beach. This year’s edition saw management executives and over 240 ‘Accoriors’ from the sales and marketing discuss AccorHotels’ broader India Vision, Sales, Marketing and Brand Strategy.
At the summit, the India marketing strategy for 2016 was presented. The key emphasis was to increase brand awareness across AccorHotels and to ensure the sales and marketing teams work cohesively to drive the key strategies for guest and brand engagement programs across the wider AccorHotels network. Given its growing portfolio of Ibis hotels in India and market share in the economy category, the dedicated sales workshop focused in key essential learning areas on overall quality, brand and product training.
Nikhil Dhodapkar, Regional Director, Sales and Marketing, AccorHotels India said, “Our key strengths lies in our ability to innovate, to transform with time and to ensure highest quality. Going forward in 2016, we must leverage these towards achieving a market leader position.”
In line with AccorHotels’ digital transformation globally, extensive training modules with specific action points and expectations were defined to the team members. The transformation which is built around migration to mobile devices ensures a more personalized service and a seamless journey for the customer.
Jean-Michel Casse, Senior Vice-President, Operations, AccorHotels India, congratulated the team for yet another successful year running said, “We strive to create value added service for all our guests, partners and employees at AccorHotels. I am pleased to see that our Sales and Marketing teams have rigorously worked on growing our brands, building strong distribution channels and implementing our loyalty programs to drive industry wide leadership for AccorHotels India”.
Other highlights of the ‘One Accor One Sales’ meet include team building development and motivational exercises through DRUMJAM’s sessions. Key achievements such as record number of room nights achieved for the year, the launch and key openings of Novotel Imagica Khopoli, Pullman New Delhi Aerocity, Novotel New Delhi Aerocity along with a range of sales and marketing initiatives for the year were shared at the summit.
The meet concluded with a gala awards night to recognise and honour key partners of AccorHotels. Cricket commentator Harsha Bhogle infused the evening with excitement and motivation for all attendees.
